wikipedia.title: Make 'Em Say Uhh!
wikipedia.extract: "Make Em Say Uhh!" is the second single from Master P's 1997 studio album, Ghetto D, produced by KLC.  The album was released in 1997, but the single was not released until January 1998. The song featured performers Fiend, Silkk The Shocker, Mia X & Mystikal, and had reached #16 on the Billboard Hot 100 making it Master P's highest charting single at the time (tied with "I Got the Hook-Up!").
